channel.title: Krita on A Nerd's Tale
channel.description: Recent content in Krita on A Nerd's Tale

item.title: Dissecting boost::astar_search
item.description: Right now, I am having a hard time understanding BGL’s (the Boost Graph Library) template spaghetti, so decided to write a blogpost while I decipher it, one at a time, documenting the whole thing along the way.

item.title: Summer is coming...
item.description: Note: Not a Game of Thrones fan, yet to watch even a single episode, but I wanted a catchy title This will be a story, so get prepared to be bored, ðŸ˜¸.
